attributes.action: Make Social Housing Associations accountable to Central Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently Social Housing Associations are accountable for their actions to no one. Hard to believe? But true.
If they were made accountable to the Government then that same Government could 'force' Housing Associations to take action against unruly tenants or nuisance neighbours instead of simply ignoring the problem hoping it will go away.
